description.displayText: It gives me great joy to have the opportunity to say something nice about Cherry!! She is a pure joy and the perfect mix of smart and silly!! Our 3 girls cherish their time with her, and my husband and I couldn't feel more comfortable leaving our little ladies with such a delightful person!!
